title: 74/518/EEC: Council Decision of 21 October 1974 regarding the list of agricultural regions where unfavourable conditions exist within the meaning of Directive No 72/160/EEC, situated in Ireland
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 21 October 1974  regarding the list of agricultural regions where unfavourable conditions exist within the meaning of Directive No 72/160/EEC, situated in Ireland  (74/518/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following regions of Ireland shall be considered agricultural regions where unfavourable conditions exist within the meaning of Article 10 (2) and (3) of Directive No 72/160/EEC:
Leinster
Munster
Connacht
Ulster (Cavan, Donegal, Monaghan).
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 21 October 1974.
For the Council
The President
Ch. BONNET
(1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 9.
